Title: Hercules
Overview: When a new enemy threatens the innocent, Hercules must lead his fearless team of warriors in a battle against overwhelming odds.
Tagline: Before he was a legend, he was a man.
Keywords: mercenary, battle, ancient greece, hercules, warrior, sagen
production_companies: Paramount Pictures, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM), Radical Studios, Flynn Picture Company
Cast: Dwayne Johnson, Ian McShane, John Hurt
